item.title: thoughts on the future of TRATATE
item.description: As of right now, it’s been a while since I’ve updated TRATATE1, which was mostly due to school and a general loss of interest. I’ve come full circle funnily enough, thinking about how to effectively manage tasks again and failing to find a tool that fits my specific needs. What are those needs? Currently, it’s only one: I’d like a program that is awfully simple to use, but under the hood takes into consideration user preferences and past task completion data to make a proper schedule… Okay, well maybe more than one but the gist of what it should do is presented here.
